## Presentation

<p class = "text"> On this page, we will present you a video of the routes of the bicycles Velomag in the city of Montpellier for the date of Monday, July 10, 2023. This date corresponds to the first day of the second week of the Tour de France. </p>

<p class = "text"> This allows us to deepen the results we have obtained in the maps game and will allow us to look at what is happening in terms of traffic of cyclists during the different hours of a day. </p>

<p class = "text"> We decided to choose a day of the week because we could notice on the maps that there was less traffic during the weekend.</p>
